name: Lost Life: Origins [Act-I, Act-II]
description:
It all began with a woman who fell from a waterfall, starting a cascade of catastrophic events.

Lost Life is a first person survival horror game, oriented on exploration.

◽ Explore Semi-Open World , discover hidden places and events.
Fighting monsters is not the main point, although it takes a significant part of the game.
Your task is to observe the world surrounding you and search for clues that lead you throughout the game.

◽ Find collectable items for customising your stats and unlocking hidden events.
In the game, you may find various collectable items that may somehow affect your further game experience.

◽ Fight a vast diversity of enemies using complex combat system.
Different monsters have different abilities and weak points, keep that in mind when fighting them. Some of them are easier to take down in close combat, while others should definitely be avoided. For now.

◽ Stealth is an option when it comes to saving your life.
There is always an opportunity to stay unnoticed, but you should also be aware that different enemies require different approach. Sometimes you may find yourself in a position where you have to decide whether it is better to move in the dark or just making as less noise as possible is already enough.

◽ Travel between alternative realities to solve the town's biggest mystery.
The world around you constantly changes. The further you go, the more it changes, and not for the better. The only option for you left is to adapt and find the cause of disturbance, whatever the cost.
◽ Railgun customisation options.


Watch the town reveal its darker side right in front of your eyes.
